## Encode Linux

```shell-session
Tachipy@htb[/htb]$ cat id_rsa |base64 -w 0;echo


```


## Decode Windows

```powershell-session
PS C:\htb> [IO.File]::WriteAllBytes("C:\Users\Public\id_rsa", [Convert]::FromBase64String(""))
```

## Encode in PowerShell

```powershell-session
PS C:\htb> [Convert]::ToBase64String((Get-Content -path "C:\Windows\system32\drivers\etc\hosts" -Encoding byte))
```

## Decode in Linux
```shell-session
Tachipy@htb[/htb]$ echo  | base64 -d > hosts
```
